text: Sylvia Nickerson is a Canadian comic book writer. In May 2020 Nickerson received The Nipper, one of the Doug Wright Awards for comic book artists, for her work Creation. Creations themes include the changes she underwent when she became a mother, and how the works of artist helped shape the gentrification of her home town. Nickerson, a resident of Hamilton, Ontario, was interviewed by the Hamilton Spectator, on April 4, 2019. ==References== Category:Canadian comics writers Category:21st-century Canadian women writers Category:Living people Category:Writers from Hamilton, Ontario Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sylvia Nickerson
